articles.author: Jennifer A Dlouhy, Naureen S Malik
articles.title: Trump to Direct Key US Grid Operator to Hold Emergency Auction - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: President Donald Trump and the governors of several US Northeastern states agreed to push for an emergency wholesale electricity auction that would compel technology companies to effectively fund new power plants.
articles.content: President Donald Trump and the governors of several US Northeastern states agreed to push for an emergency wholesale electricity auction that would compel technology companies to effectively fund new… [+299 chars]

articles.author: Beth Mole
articles.title: “I am very annoyed”: Pharma execs blast RFK Jr.’s attack on vaccines - Ars Technica
articles.description: Pharma execs had avoided conflict with Trump admin, but now join doctors in rebukes.

articles.title: Drug ring's "monkey" technique used young swimmers to stash cocaine on ships at sea, Spanish police say - CBS News
articles.description: Police said they had busted a network that saw smugglers swim on the high seas to help stash Colombian cocaine on container ships and hijack vessels.
articles.content: Spanish police on Thursday said they had busted a network that saw smugglers swim on the high seas to help stash Colombian cocaine on Europe-bound container ships and hijack vessels. The bust was rev… [+2721 chars]

articles.author: University of Colorado at Boulder
articles.title: An earthquake on a chip: New tech could make smartphones smaller, faster - Tech Xplore
articles.description: A team of engineers has made major strides in generating the tiniest earthquakes imaginable. The team's device, known as a surface acoustic wave phonon laser, could one day help scientists make more sophisticated versions of chips in cellphones and other wire…
